name: retrieve-artifact
description: Retrieve a single artifact version from the stage in the artifactz.io repository
author: IKtech Limited

inputs.name: serviceUrl
inputs.label: Web Service URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Artifactz.io web service URL. When omitted production instance url is used (https://artifactor.artifactz.io)

inputs.name: apiToken
inputs.label: API Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactz.io API token with the read access

inputs.name: stage
inputs.label: Stage
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the stage from which task will retrieve artifact

inputs.name: artifact
inputs.label: Artifact name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the artifact to retrieve version

inputs.name: proxyUrl
inputs.label: Proxy URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the proxy to use to access the Artifactz.io site

inputs.name: proxyUsername
inputs.label: Proxy Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The proxy username when proxy requires authentication

inputs.name: proxyPassword
inputs.label: Proxy Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The proxy password when proxy requires authentication

outputVariables.name: version
outputVariables.description: Requested artifact version from the specified stage
